import React ,{useContext, useState} from 'react' import noteContext from "../context/notes/noteContex" const AddNote = (props) => { const context = useContext(noteContext) const { Addnote } = context const [note , setNote] = useState({title:"" , description:"" , tag:""}) const handleclick = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() Addnote(note.title , note.description , note.tag) setNote({title:"" , description:"" , tag:""}) props.showAlert("Created successfully","success") } const onchange = (e) =>{ setNote({...note , [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (

Add a note

) } export default AddNote
